name: koishi-plugin-image-save-path
description: [<ruby>保存图片<rp>（</rp><rt>点我查看食用方法</rt><rp>）</rp></ruby>](https://www.npmjs.com/package/koishi-plugin-image-save-path) 💾支持[交互保存图片](https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/article/0b293dc3751bea6f6f73dfc3c2eac439312276085.png) 、 [回复保存图片](https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/article/b0feedf358c1a29e2475ac8c1991b222312276085.png) 、 [批量保存图片](https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/article/a3f0844195795fc7e51f947e689fd744312276085.png) 、 [中间件批量保存图片](https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/article/23e26c25d805e0d5d5d76958e5950d56312276085.png)。🤖支持重命文件名和后缀名。
